gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 117, 76ers 114
gameRecap.excerpt: Cleveland defeats Philadelphia, 117-114. For Cleveland, Georges Niang led the way with 25 points (five 3PM) while aided by Evan Mobley (20 points, 11 rebounds) in the victory. Kyle Lowry finished with 23 points and six assists with Tobias Harris adding 21 points and seven rebounds while Tyrese Maxey recorded 16 points and 11 assists for Philadelphia in the losing effort. Cleveland improves to 39-35, while Philadelphia moves to 45-29 in the loss.
